item.sixtysecmod.soup.tooltip: Can be stored for up to 737 years!
item.sixtysecmod.water.tooltip: Essence of life - basis of survival.
item.sixtysecmod.gas_mask.tooltip: Bad smell? Toxic fog? Just put on a gas mask and keep enjoying life!
item.sixtysecmod.medkit.tooltip: For all injuries, ranging from paper cut to decapitations.
item.sixtysecmod.radio.tooltip: Keep up with the world even after it ends!
item.sixtysecmod.suitcase.tooltip: Store extra supplies for vacation with the suitcase!
